help.title: ping
help.name: ping - an example command
help.description: ping - an example command that I used to see if the bot would crash and burn

options.-h: Displays this help page. Works for every command.
options.-a: A flag called `a`, can be checked with `context.args.flag('a')`
options.-b, -c: Two other meaningless flags, as you can see you can combine two flags when using a single dash
options.-d: This looks similar to a flag but in fact will have the value `3`. `-d3` would is identical
options.--foo: A named parameter with the value `bar`
options.--bop: This argument is passed a string enclosed with quotes to segment it off
